original_title: အမွေဆက်ခံသူ
overview: When the first World War begins, the British Empire forced the colonist from he countries in the battlefield because of insufficient laborers, Since th Chin Hills (now Chin State, Burma) was under the British Colony's, the residents were intended to fight the battle too. For them whose lives are assembled with cultures has no hope for coming back but must serve except the heir son for battle. However, for the heir son, Songtheu has to adandon the cultures he has been keeping through his life to join the army with no excuse. Based on Songtheu's biography
title: Inherit
